SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE (SME) PADDY MILLERS

column1: Considering the Government initiatives to support the SME Paddy Millers amidst COVID-19 pandemic for the upcoming harvesting
seasons, licensed commercial banks and licensed specialised banks (hereinafter referred to as licensed banks), are required to
suspend recovery actions against SME Paddy Millers for a period of six months commencing from 1 January 2021 as specified
